content:
@Ricky Sahu and/or @Mark Scrimshire or anyone - before we leave Atlanta (I'm leaving to airport by noon Thursday) I need to get a demonstration of the different types of data one can get from BlueButton.

As I've said many times before, some people tell me BB is only claims data, which would be of no use to e.g. Mike Morris.

Here's a good description of what we get from EHRs directly and from Blue
Button https://1up.health/faq/dev/d/faq-data-available-via-health-systems

Ricky Sahu
CEO
1upHealth <https://1up.health>
Where the heck did I get the idea you only do blue button? Thanks x
So where in that is the clinical info Michael Morris aggregated?
Blue Button 2.0 is only claims via FHIR API. Old Blue Button (it did not have a number then) is downloading a bunch of stuff using a CDA (basically an XML document with the complete health data)
"original blue button 2010 style" is downloading a plain text file with the same :-))
Note that the VA still provides the original TEXT format of the bluebutton...
bluebutton went through many technical formats: CCR, XPHR, C32, CCD, C-CDA, ...
